```{r}
num_cols <- 10
num_rows <- 5
mat <- matrix(runif(num_cols * num_rows, 0, 100), nrow=num_rows, ncol=num_cols)
colnames(mat) <- c("cond1", "cond2", "cond3", "cond4", "cond5", 
                "ctrl1", "ctrl2", "ctrl3", "ctrl4", "ctrl5")
rownames(mat) <- c("gene1", "gene2", "gene3", "gene4", "gene5")

avg_cond <- apply(mat, MARGIN=1, FUN=function(x){sum(x[1:5])})
avg_cont <- apply(mat, MARGIN=1, FUN=function(x){sum(x[6:10])})

fc <- avg_cont / avg_cond

fc

```
